title: $2,900 MIT / Kendall: Beautiful + Clean Apt: Watch Video!
posting_body: ['Availability September 1; Lease: 12 months, 9/1/2022 - 8/31/2022.', 'Price:', '- $2900 / month, includes heat and hot water.', 'Tenants responsible for electricity, gas for cooking and telecommunications.', '- Due at signing, First $2900, Security deposit $2900, and broker fee of $2900', '- Strong references, credit and verifiable income required', 'Email soon as this beautiful apartment will go fast!', 'Video tour link: https://youtu.be/ojxeD9EdgkI', 'Condo description:', 'This light and bright space on the top (4th) floor is perfectly set up for two people.', 'Its bedrooms are oriented on opposite ends of the apartment, making it perfect for a roommate situation.', 'The beautiful shared courtyard boasts a lush garden, mature fruit trees and a common outdoor dining and grill area.', 'The eat-in kitchen has been updated and is fully equipped with dish-, silver-, bake-, and cookware as well as a gas-range stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave.', 'The attractive back splash and light wood cabinetry make this a pleasant, cook-friendly kitchen.', 'The living room is situated between the bedrooms and has a comfortable sleeper sofa, coffee table, and flat-screen television.', 'Bathroom has been completely updated!', 'The entire apartment features large windows which provide fabulous sun and views of Boston from the fourth floor as well as high ceilings and wood floors throughout.', 'The building also has an on-site laundry room and indoor bicycle storage.', 'The Neighborhood', 'This apartment is ideally located in the desirable neighborhood of East Cambridge (between Inman and Lechmere squares) which is close to four major squares--Kendall, Inman, Central and Harvard--and close by to the Kendall and Lechmere T stations.', "The apartment is nestled in a charming area with an abundance of great restaurants, cafes, pubs, and bakeries (Atwood's Tavern, The Loyal Nine, and Lone Star Taco Bar).", 'Another HUGE plus is the apartment is also located close to both Star Market and Target!', 'Transportation', "Public transportation couldn't be more convenient as the 69 bus stop (which takes you directly to Inman, Harvard, and Lechmere Squares) is located across the street from the apartment.", 'It runs frequently.', 'Additionally, Lechmere and Kendall stations are less than a mile away.', 'Other local amenities/shopping include:', "• Shaw's grocery store", '• Target', '• Bank of America', '• Cambridgeside Galleria Shopping Mall', '• . .', '.and', 'lots more']
